column4: hi everyone, i have Ubuntu Server 9.04 and i'm using Firestarter to share the internet connection, the problem is that it seems to be that somehow the internet connection is being splitted and i can't get the full speed, anyone knows how can solve this ?
its sharing te connection, not acting as a switch and i dont think that software can do that...
i don't know why but my server has a public ip and as far as i know, it has a dedicated connection of 900 KB/s, but when i start a download i can't get more than 70KB/s
